ygData.messageBody:
>
> I just bought the song and have yet to try it out. I understand faction and
> all. I was wondering about npc's with no faction standing (say a bat, or a
> wasp for example - I would also think even Mistmoore Gargoyles fall under
> this category), if you use the song on something that is "ready to attack",
> does it make the creature "indifferent" or "apprehensive"?? Or does it only
> work on npc's with faction ratings? It would be cool to be able to walk into
> an evil city using this song, kinda like an evil enchanter could disguise
> him/herself and walk into Freeport.

I think that since it affects the entire faction, you SHOULD be able to walk
into an evil city and start changing their factions... but:

a) I have a suspicion you have to modify their faction before combat gets
started, so for aggressive NPCs, you'd better sing at them before they see you.

b) Cities usually have many factions. I'd hate to have the guards love me only
to get squished by a merchant.

c) I have no idea how long this effect lasts.

Jyzan
